item.title: 3 Fast Food Stocks Defying the Odds
item.description: Fast food is out, fast casual is in. Changing consumer trends have punished fast food chains lately, but these 3 companies are innovating to lure back...

item.title: Analog Devices and an AI-Driven Semiconductor Supercycle
item.description: Analog Devices is well-positioned to benefit from a long-term supercycle powered by AI, and the analysts are pushing the stock price to new highs.

item.title: Palantir is Selling Off, BigBear.ai Could Be Your Hedge
item.description: There is a major performance and valuation gap between Palantir and BigBear.ai stocks in the market today, one that may be closed down.

item.title: Ozempic Boom: Hims & Eli Lilly Lead Healthcare Bets
item.description: The race inside the weight loss industry is ramping up, leaving investors with three names to choose from in how they want to play this theme.

item.title: 3 Energy Stocks That Could Rally If the Oil Bears Are Wrong
item.description: Oil bears may be too crowded; if demand surprises higher, Chevron, Exxon, and Schlumberger could see strong upside as oil prices rally
